comment.author: 35607158@N06
comment._content:
The Park's architect, Frederick Law Olmsted (much better known for the design of Central Park) had this reservoir imposed upon him by Montreal City Council. See: A.L. Murray "Frederick Law Olmsted and the Design of Mount Royal Park, Montreal" Journal of the Society of Architectural Historians, Vol. 26, No. 3 (Oct., 1967), pp. 163-
171
